snippet: Mr. Trump said of Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, “He’s not going into Ukraine,” then was informed that Russia was already there. “O.K., well, he’s there in a certain way,” Mr. Trump replied....
abstract: Donald Trump gives confused statement of his views of Russian annexation of Crimea in 2014 in interview with George Stephanopoulos on news program This Week; says Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin would not direct his forces to go into Ukraine if he becomes president, and offers fractured response to Stephanopoulos when it is pointed out Russian troops have been in Ukraine for two years.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump said of Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, “He’s not going into Ukraine,” then was informed that Russia was already there. “O.K., well, he’s there in a certain way,” Mr. Trump replied.

headline.main: Donald Trump Gives Questionable Explanation of Events in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Trump Tripped Up on Ukraine and Putin
